sitename: Inner Qi Chiropractic & Acupuncture Wellness Center
cleaned_text: Inner Qi Wellness offers essential oil therapy that is able to help with a wide-variety of symptoms from headaches to soothing inflammatory areas of the body. Our doctors are Aroma Acupoint Therapy - Level 1 certified and offer advice upon which essential oils are best for you. Inner Qi Wellness Center also can provide you with essential oils for home use ranging from $16.00 to $25.00. We carry such oils as: Office Hours - Mon 10:00am - 6:00pm - Tues - 7:00pm - - Thurs Closed - Fri 1:00pm - 6:00pm - Sat Closed - Sun Closed [(951) 428-4135](tel:(951) 428-4135) Our Wellness Center [710 Rimpau
